definition: a woman who dies fighting for her honor or follows her husband in death
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: Wang Baochuan is the unofficial history of spoony women "model".
sentences.chinese: 王宝钏是唐朝野史中痴情烈女的“楷模”。

sentences.english: Faithful wives and heroic maidens: Politics, Virtue, and Gender in Song China.
sentences.chinese: 节妇烈女和宋代的政治，道德，和性别观念。

sentences.english: Dying for the art so, really, she's a martyr.
sentences.chinese: 为艺术而死，真的，是个烈女。

definition: ready to die to preserve one's chastity
female virgin/widow who does not remarry
memorial arch in honor of a chaste widow
(of a widow) faithful to the death to her husband's memory

Confucian moral injunctions for women, namely: obey in turn three men father, husband and son, plus the four virtues of morality 德, physical charm 容, propriety in speech 言 and efficiency in needlework 功
ungrateful/heartless/to fail to be loyal to one's love
to keep oneself pure/to preserve one's integrity/to remain chaste
